name: Good Morning is Good Night
description:
Take a casual walk through space and time to cheer up a friend.

Good Morning is Good Night is a relaxing adventure game meant to put you at ease. Take your time exploring a sleepy little town and perform acts of kindness that transcend time.

Art & Writing by Viv - smuckerz (itch.io) / @emojakeyg (Instagram)

Code & Audio by Paul - @PaulSim_ / piratetune (itch.io)

Good Morning is Good Night was made for a jam about time.
